item.title: Dose anyone know
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Curse you and your modifies!
No. You would recreate another form of starter. Ahh…Let’s just call it portalGivingPower

[code]case 2469: // Master Skillcape Portal
if(portalGivingPower == 0) {
sendMessage(“The Gods Gift you With a Magical Cape and Hood!”);
addItem(10771, 1);
addItem(10770, 1);
sendMessage(“You’ve got your Magical Cape and hood !”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " Just Got A Master Skillcape!!");

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
portalGivingPower = 1
} else
if (PortalGivingPower == 1) {
sendMessage(“You’ve already recieved your master magic stuff.”);
}
break;[/code]
If you add a method for portalGivingPower, that should work.

Ownage, Itz, don’t jump to conclusions while I’m typing

Read full topic

case 2469: // Master Skillcape Portal
